bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks-Port-Based Network Access Control Amendment: MAC Security Key Agreement protocol (MKA) extensions
IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks-Port-Based Network Access Control Amendment: MAC Security Key Agreement protocol (MKA) extensions
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE P802.1Xbx/D1.2 ,DRAFT Amendment to IEEE Std 802.1X2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment adds MACsec (Media Access Control security) Key Agreement protocol (MKA) data elements and procedures that provide additional security and manageability capabilities, including the ability to maintain secure communication while the operation of MKA is suspended, when used in conjunction with MACsec Cipher Suites that support Extended Packet Numbering.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
